about_the_game:
This puzzle pack has 400 extra puzzles for the game Puzzling Wild IQ Test. When you download this DLC just restart the game and you will be able to access these 400 extra puzzles in the settings menu.

Think the first 400 puzzles were too easy? These extra 400 puzzles will give you more of a challenge.
detailed_description:
This puzzle pack has 400 extra puzzles for the game Puzzling Wild IQ Test. When you download this DLC just restart the game and you will be able to access these 400 extra puzzles in the settings menu.

Think the first 400 puzzles were too easy? These extra 400 puzzles will give you more of a challenge.
name: Puzzling Wild DLC - 400 extra puzzle pack
short_description: This puzzle pack has 400 extra puzzles for the game Puzzling Wild IQ Test. They offer more of a challenge to the original puzzles.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
